reject_unauthorized.title: Enforce Authorized Requests
reject_unauthorized.description: Enable certificate validation for the CircleCI server

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout
request_timeout.description: The max time in milliseconds to wait for a request to CircleCI complete (0 - no timeout).

max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to CircleCI API

project_slugs.title: Project Slugs
project_slugs.description: Project slugs to sync in the form "vcs-slug/org-name/repo-name". Enter "*" for all projects. For projects that use GitLab or GitHub App use "circleci/org-id/project-id".

project_block_list.title: Project Slug Blocklist
project_block_list.description: List of project slugs that should be excluded from syncing. Use exact project slugs or use wildcard characters to filter according to slug patterns, similar to regular expressions.

pull_blocklist_from_graph.title: Pull Projects Blocklist from Faros Graph
pull_blocklist_from_graph.description: Should pull projects blocklist from Faros

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of projects to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute projects across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources

round_robin_bucket_execution.title: Round Robin Bucket Execution
round_robin_bucket_execution.description: When enabled, syncs rotate through all buckets, processing one bucket per sync. When disabled, only the bucket specified by 'bucket_id' is synced.

bucket_ranges.title: Bucket Ranges
bucket_ranges.description: List of bucket ranges to process when round robin bucket execution is enabled. Each element can be either a single bucket number (e.g., '7') or a range of buckets (e.g., '3-5'). All bucket numbers must be between 1 and 'bucket_total'.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch data updated after cutoff
